name: Spirit Board VR
description:
Finally a Ouija board VR game for Cardboard VR and compatible headsets!

Enter the paranormal world and conduct a séance in virtual reality! Summon spirits and find out who they are and what they want. Ask questions by staring at the list of choices. See the responses on the spirit board via the planchette.

360 degree viewing experience.

Be Warned as some of the spirits are friendly and some are not!

Best experienced wearing headphones in a dark room.

Swivel chair highly recommended.

Cardboard or compatible Virtual Reality headset required.

Warning: This horror experience my be frightening for some and absolutely terrifying for others.
